          <title>
            <string language="fi">Silitysrauta 5</string>
            <string language="en">Iron 5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisen 5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fer 5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ferro 5</string>

          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroskuva hoito-ohjemerkinnöissä käytettävästä, silityksen kieltävästä symbolista.</string>
            <string language="en">Drawing of iron-related care label used that prohibits ironing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">care</string>
            <string language="en">iron-related</string>
            <string language="en">label</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnung des Eisen-in Verbindung stehenden 
Obachtkennsatzes verwendete, der verbietet zu bügeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma de l'étiquette fer-connexe de soin a 
utilisé qui interdit repasser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho da etiqueta ferro-relacionada do 
cuidado usou-se que proíbe ironing.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione dell'etichetta ferro-relativa di 
cura ha usato che proibisce rivestire di ferro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο της σίδηρος-σχετικής ετικέτας προσοχής 
χρησιμοποιούμενης που απαγορεύει το σιδέρωμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico de la escritura de la etiqueta 
hierro-relacionada del cuidado utilizó que prohíbe el planchar.</string>
          </description>
